scripts.build: command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1 && forge build || echo 'Foundry not installed, skipping Solidity build'
scripts.generate:abis: mkdir -p abis && forge build && cp out/TaskManager.sol/TaskManager.json abis/ && cp out/EscrowVault.sol/EscrowVault.json abis/ && cp out/VerificationHub.sol/VerificationHub.json abis/ && cp out/PorterRegistry.sol/PorterRegistry.json abis/
